title: FS T206 Chick Gandil, Black Sox

posts.post_title: FS T206 Chick Gandil, Black Sox
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone, 

I have this nicely centered Chick Gandil for sale. No creases, or paper loss. Measures right, 2 5/8 X 1 1/2, but the top edge looks wavy to me and the card may have been trimmed.

Still a very sharp looking card.

$130.00 delivered.

Prefer check or money order. Paypal is also okay.

First email with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
